name: My Jurassic Farm
description:
At the beginning of the game, all you own is an empty field, a few pennies and a single little compsognathus... You need to feed your compsognathus, take care of it and improve its lifestyle. Well fed with meat, your compsognathus will lay eggs which can then be sold to the Shopkeeper. With this money, you can buy new animals at the Farmers’ Market...

  • 10 kinds of animals to customize!
  • Take care of your animals: food, clean, disease, etc.
  • Many farm improvement to buy and bonuses to collect!
